name: lucky-egg
effect: Held: Increases any Exp the holder gains by 50%.
short_effect: Held: Increases EXP earned in battle by 50%.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s an egg filled with happiness that earns the holder extra Exp. Points in battle.
